::Rex/Ramulus::

Rex's eyes widen as he hears a voice in his head, the Maximal looking around 
even as he hears the voice tell him not to. He growls, listening to what 
Voluis had to say. His eyes widen slightly as Voluis shows him the vision of 
fighting bots. He calms down slightly. It was only natural: Maximals and 
Predacons always founght, and killed, each other.

Rex calmy looks at the next vision, then narrowing his eyes at Voluis' words. 
He might be a racist (or a factionist), but he had his reasons. Many of them. 
Rex growls as he feels the presence leave his mind, the Maximal looking at 
Battera.

"This Voluis seems to have interesting abilties," he says to her, "But how 
can he be sure that the Predacons and the Alliance cooperate?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus gallops out of the forest, coming to stop near Brix/Octociz.

"Sorry I'm late, there was a canyon in the way," he says, transforming. He 
walks over to the pod, looking from it to Brix/Octociz. He had never done 
something quite like this before.

"Allright," he says, walking toward the other bot, "How exactly do we 
transfer your spark?"
